ro.top.main

Class NotificationServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ro.top.main.NotificationServer

  • public final class NotificationServer
extends java.lang.Object
    The main class for push notification server api. If you are integrating this api, then make sure you will always end your app using System.exit(). Otherwise, the NotificationServer will never stop the RMI processes. If you are using this api as a standalone with gui, then you don't have to concerned about anything

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_PORT 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String getLocalIp()
      Obtains and filters the ip addresses of all network interfaces and returns the right local ip address (starting with "192.")
      static void start(int port, boolean runWithGui)
      Starts the Notification Server on this localhost, on the specified PORT
      static void start(int port, boolean runWithGui, java.io.OutputStream redirectOut, java.io.OutputStream redirectErr)
      Starts the Notification Server on this localhost, on the specified PORT
      static void stop()
      Quietly stops the server, without notifying any subscriber
      static void stop(java.lang.Object data)
      Stops the server and notifies all the active subscribers with th specified data

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_PORT

        public static final int DEFAULT_PORT
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public static void start(int port,
                         boolean runWithGui)
        Starts the Notification Server on this localhost, on the specified PORT
        Parameters:
        port - where to start the server process
        runWithGui - tells whether or not the server should start its gui.
        It is highly recommended to set this to true if you are not integrating this jar into another application

      • getLocalIp

        public static java.lang.String getLocalIp()
                                   throws java.net.SocketException
        Obtains and filters the ip addresses of all network interfaces and returns the right local ip address (starting with "192.")
        Returns:
        the local ip address of this host
        Throws:
        java.net.SocketException

      • start

        public static void start(int port,
                         boolean runWithGui,
                         java.io.OutputStream redirectOut,
                         java.io.OutputStream redirectErr)
        Starts the Notification Server on this localhost, on the specified PORT
        Parameters:
        port - where to start the server process
        runWithGui - tells whether or not the server should start its gui.
        It is highly recommended to set this to true if you are not integrating this jar into another application
        redirectOut - redirect the standard output stream
        redirectErr - redirect the standard error stream

      • stop

        public static void stop()
        Quietly stops the server, without notifying any subscriber

      • stop

        public static void stop(java.lang.Object data)
        Stops the server and notifies all the active subscribers with th specified data
        Parameters:
        data - data to be send to all subscribers
